programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: (The Need For Speed, United States of America, 2015) China runs on two gears as it moves millions of people around every day. A young driver of one of the world's fastest trains and two seasoned pilots of one of the world's biggest airlines are seeing the effects modernization and globalization have on their journeys. Meanwhile, in downtown Shanghai a recreational revolution is taking place as the youth choose bikes and skateboards over four wheels.

programme.title: Brittany
programme.desc: (Germany, France, 2012) The region is wild and rough, ruled by tempestuous winds and seas. Its population proud and willful. Many of them still speak their indigenous language today. The Celts named Brittany "Armorica", "the place by the sea". The Atlantic dominates life here, where tides soar, stone houses lie low against the storms, and where America beckons from the western tip. Brittany enjoys a special status among the French regions. Coarse and rugged, scarred by centuries-long disputes between English or French domination, it still boasts breathtaking beauty and authenticity. What does being from Brittany mean today?

programme.title: Japanese Heights
programme.desc: (France, 2014) There is more to Japan's natural landscape than just Mount Fuji! Discover the country's numerous mountains and the ethos of the people who live there. From mountains with eight peaks, mountain gods who keep locals in their awe to building snow monsters & embracing modern activities like skiing - this documentary shows the unseen side to Japan!

programme.title: Arctic: The Route Of the Nuclear-powered Icebreakers
programme.desc: (Germany, France, 2008) This report accompanies a polar cargo ship through the Arctic Sea and provides a rare insight into the interior of the Russian nuclear-powered icebreaker float. Along the north coast of Russia, a land of climatic extremes, lies one of the most difficult to navigate straits in the world. The Northern Sea route is a 6,000 kilometer shipping lane through the Polar Sea.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: (Defenses, Bohemia, United States of America, 2015) Some have powerful strides and flashing teeth, some employ poisons and trickery, so we know for sure that predators are well equipped for survival. But this episode reveals the unique ways in which animals protect themselves. Obviously, being able to flee a predator is the choice of many prey animals but there are also very interesting methods of defense which involve deception and chemistry. These include using toxic chemicals, camouflage, and mimicry. Insects that look like leaves, snakes that play dead, fish that fly, and toads with poisonous skin, these animals are among the many creatures that defend themselves in fascinating ways. Almost every animal is hunted as food by some other kind of animal and has developed ways to defend itself against predators. The relationship between predator and prey is a bit like an evolutionary arms race. As soon as one develops a weapon or defense mechanism, the other is working on an adaptation that allows them to circumvent that mechanism. Common defense mechanisms include claws, teeth, camouflage, poison, mimicry, and adaptations like echolocation. Some animals will spray toxic or foul smelling liquids at predators. Many animals have developed sophisticated defense mechanisms to help them avoid predation. Similar kinds of defenses have evolved in different species with slight variations. From the vice-like jaws of the hyena to the gunshot speed of the frog, from the strong-as-steel silk of the spider to the hypnotic patterns of the zebra, and the awesome antlers of the deer. A strong defence is key to winning the race of life.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: (Underwater Predators, Bohemia, United States of America, 2015) Almost all animals living in the sea are predators - from small fish to great white sharks and starfish to giant squid. Their bodies have been designed and built to capture prey and avoid becoming prey themselves. Raiders of the Underwater Universe have evolved to become among the more efficient war machines of our planet. There are "predators lurking" as stone fish, cleverly disguising themselves to wait for unsuspecting prey which wander too close. In an episode that illustrates the Race of Life in an underwater world of dangerous predators with razor-sharp teeth, we will see sharks, barracuda and moray eels go about their grisly business. Underwater predators have adapted some fairly extreme measures to hunt and to survive. The fish of the reef need to be fast to escape the barracuda, with its lightning speed and pincushion teeth. And stay on the alert when they swim near the lairs of the moray eel, a large and lethal creature of perhaps surprising grace and beauty. They may be ambushed by the also elegant - but deadly – lionfish. The knitting needle spines of the lionfish are capable of injecting deadly venom. Or if equally unlucky, prey can be sucked into the huge mouth of a stonefish. With so many hungry mouths to feed, it's a jungle down there.

programme.title: Deep Blue Dive
programme.desc: (South Africa, 2011) The ethos of freediving is simple. The challenge: to dive as deep as possible on just one breath. The drive: to explore the ocean in the purest way. The goal: to make it back to the surface in a coherent state. In "Deep Blue Dive" we voyage into this deep and dangerous world with Trevor Hutton, a freediver from South Africa, and reveal the extraordinary physiological challenges which have to be overcome to succeed in this sport. Trevor is a self-taught freediver operating on the periphery of the sport; southern Africa is not a chosen freediving location for good reason. The coastline is hostile, the swell runs high and the deeper water is frequented by every dangerous species of shark imaginable, the Great White in particular. Trevor is six feet tall and he weighs 220 pounds. This is a heavy frame to supply with oxygen, but he's well equipped. His lung capacity is nine litres and his average heart rate is 43 beats per minute. As soon as he hits the water, a set of strange physiological phenomena take over. We see how nerve receptors in his face trigger a response in the heart – slowing it down by an incredible 50%. Simultaneously, blood vessels in the skin and outer reaches of his body constrict, while vessels closer to internal organs dilate in anticipation of the airless environment he's plunging into. As Trevor immerses himself, a litre of blood floods from the body's periphery and into the chest. This film will illustrate these startling changes using high-end CGI and will investigate the very latest scientific research into how the body adapts at extreme depths of up to 120 metres. Trevor's quest to break the All-Africa freediving record forms the backdrop to the film. To snatch the record, he needs to train in clean, warm water so he travels to the calm waters off the KwaZulu-Natal coastline. But the ideal freediving conditions here are clouded by the presence of aggressive bull sharks. Trevor has to overcome his fear of these intimidating creatures and control his heart rate to dive efficiently. We then accompany him as he travels on to the World Cup in Greece to further his abilities, compete with the world's top divers and gain experience. The Mediterranean is the epicentre of the sport and his journey here is like a pilgrimage. But as he returns to African waters, will this experience and the rigorous training regime enable Trevor to reach his goal and claim the All-Africa record?

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: (Hack Green's Secret Nuclear Bunker, England, 2021) The Hack Green Secret Nuclear Bunker is a former government-owned nuclear bunker located at Hack Green, Cheshire, England. It Started as a decoy site for enemy bombers but later developed into a legitimate base. Now it is ripe with hauntings.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: (Ottawa, United States of America, 2014) We visit Canada's capital city on a hill in Ottawa, Ontario. We'll sail down the famous Rideau Canal locks. We go deep into Ottawa's cold war history at the Diefenbunker, as well as, explore Canada's military history at the Canadian War Museum. Then we head up the Peace Tower and take a look at the library of Parliament. Finally, we learn about Canada's first nation's tribes at the Canadian History Museum.

programme.title: Diving With Crocodiles
programme.desc: (South Africa, England, 2010) In Africa's waterways, one predator reigns supreme – the Nile crocodile. One of the biggest and most deadly reptiles on Earth, it commands a fearsome reputation and strikes terror those who share its domain. Countless attacks in which victims are ruthlessly taken from riverbanks or attacked in their canoes leave no doubt that the Nile crocodile may views humans as natural prey. In fact, the animal was recently reclassified as the number one killer of humans in Africa, overtaking the previous record holder, the hippo. In "Diving with Crocodiles" cameraman and crocodile expert Brad Bestelink undertakes the unthinkable and dives into the waters of the Okavango Delta. Without a cage or any other protection, he gets up close and personal with these fearsome creatures in this groundbreaking film. Such a feat has never been recorded before. But Brad is well prepared – his decision to take the plunge is the result of many years spent studying crocodile behavior in his native Botswana. His window of opportunity to dive is small and dependent on the seasonal ebb and flow of the Okavango. There are only a couple of months each year when visibility in the delta allows for perfect filming conditions. This extraordinary film provides all the high drama associated with modern-day exploration, coupled with the exhilaration of interacting with wild animals. The underwater secrets of the Nile crocodile are revealed with unique and compelling footage in the pristine underwater environment of the Okavango delta.

programme.title: Life Is One
programme.desc: (France, 2016) The return to life in the wild for 3 captive sun bears.

programme.title: Tuning 2 You: India's Lost Musicians
programme.desc: (West Bengal, England, India, 2017) Soumik arrives in the city of joy Kolkata in search of his musical roots and puts together his team. They head into the villages in search of travelling minstrels known as Bauls. Their journey leads them deeper into impoverished rural hinterlands where an old man sings under his broken down house. These musicians are driven by deep faith and extraordinary spiritual resilience. Their daughters sing and children learn deep lessons in simple words.

programme.title: Speed Kills
programme.desc: (Scorched Desert, United States of America, South Africa, 2014) Desert creatures endure searing heat and zero rainfall, but speed is their ticket to survival.A Tiger beetle runs at the human equivalent of 500 miles per hour. A caracal jumps six feet to swat a weaverbird out of midair. And the world's fastest chameleon hunts on the desert floor.Only the hardiest, fastest animals survive. Nothing else stands a chance.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: (Antarctica, Canada, 2020) Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after you've lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bill's bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: Depleted Uranium
programme.desc: (France, 2012) More than 50 countries now possess weapons based on depleted uranium (DU). Experimentation has been rife, and the consequences for civilians and the military alike have been dramatic. This investigation compares and contrasts the arguments of those who defend and attack a technology that is highly toxic. For 20 years, scientists, doctors, veterans and activists have denounced the use of DU. Against them are the arms industry lobbyists and nuclear authorities who continue to minimise the risks. Through archive documents, interviews and in situ investigations, accompanied by key witnesses (victims, experts...) we aim to present a clearer picture of the issues and stakes linked to the use of DU. Quick-paced, with a sense of urgency, the film underlines the essential background and conflicting viewpoints, enabling viewers to make up their own minds about a subject that concerns us all.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: (Wobbegong - The Forgotten Shark, Australia, 2023) Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Capture Wild School
programme.desc: (England, United States of America, 2016) A boma is created with a funnel system and students are placed in strategic areas to man the curtain rails..

programme.title: Colonies Under the Sea
programme.desc: (France, 2019) The film follows four unique divers as they explore shipwrecks in the heart of the Bahamas archipelago in order to discover the unexpected life they harbor.

programme.title: The New Cuba
programme.desc: (Germany, France, 2014) Cuba, decades after the revolution. There is a new spirit emerging in Havana. Reforms are encouraging new business ideas and a large number of licenses have been issued for independent enterprise. The sale of real estate and cars has been legalized. In the socialist enclave of Cuba, there is now a spirit of letting visions and lifestyles become reality, of shaping a new Cuba. "ArteCorte" is such a dream come true. The master hair stylist Papito has built up the best beauty salon in the city. Customers love "ArteCorte" and are all very different from one another: young and old, proper and offbeat, poor and slightly less poor.

programme.title: The Last Camel Caravans Of the Sahara
programme.desc:
(Germany, France, 2009) 360° GEO - Report takes part in an exhausting journey exhausting journey through desert heat and drought. In the times of the pharaohs, people trekked through the desert between what is today Sudan and Egypt. They travelled in camel-caravans, loaded with ivory, salt, ostrich feathers and other precious cargoes. Even today, the Bedouin tribes follow these ancient trade routes, but today, it is the camels themselves that are sold to Egypt.
Approximately 3 million camels exist in Sudan alone and about 200,000 animals per year are sold to Egypt. One of the most important yet dangerous paths leads from Kordufan via Darfur to South Egypt. It is called the Darb al- Arba'in - " 40-Day road". Only experienced caravan leaders dare to undertake the laborious journey.

programme.title: Leopards of Dead Tree Island
programme.desc: (South Africa, 2010) "Leopards of Dead Tree Island" (1 x 52') takes us on an unforgettable HD journey into the lives of these three cats: Mosweo – a young mother who gave birth to two cubs during the abundance of summer. She is solitary by nature and takes on parenthood alone. Will she be able to rear and defend her cubs in this challenging environment - competing with lions and hyenas and coping with floods and drought? Buddah is the dominant male leopard of Dead Tree Island. He is the father of Mosweo's cubs but he offers her no support or protection. To further complicate matters Tipa, her previous offspring, still shares her same territory, competing for food and posing a threat to her new cubs. He is now an independent three year old moving dangerously close to his mother's new den site. He is an insider that she has tolerated so far. But, with the arrival of her new set of cubs he's become an adversary that needs to be dealt with. Tipa also remains within his father's territory. Buddah's heavy frame and mauled ears allude to his age and stature. He moves through Dead Tree island with confidence and entitlement, fighting off his most irritating of rivals – baboons. Tipa's efforts to hunt and assert his own authority are clumsy and naïve in comparison. The island covers the natural hunting grounds of all these secretive cats, they are drawn together by circumstances beyond their control leading to tension, drama and ultimately tragedy. Mosweo loses one cub to a predator and then finds the last of her litter paralyzed and dying. She tries everything in her power to comfort and revive her doomed offspring – but to no avail. Mosweo's is forced out of Dead Tree island when Buddah's attention strays towards an exciting new scent. A new, stronger female has made her way into his territory and Mosweo tries desperately to divert his attention away from this new rival. But the new female is in estrus and mates with Buddah, thereby cementing her own place among the group of leopards at Dead Tree Island. The contrasting environments of the Okavango Delta provide a uniquely beautiful backdrop as this drama unfolds among the Leopards of Dead Tree Island.

programme.title: River King
programme.desc:
(Netherlands, 2016) Some parts of Africa have not been explored by even the most adventurous anglers. Wars, upheavals and uncertainties have made large areas of the Nile Basin in particular too challenging and dangerous to visit.
Wim Seffelaar is a teacher in daily life, but a keen angler whenever he has the chance. Over the decades he has explored some of the remotest rivers of Africa. Now he is on a quest to catch one of the most iconic and elusive of all African river fish – the legendary Nile perch. They grow to enormous proportions on a stretch of river bordering South Sudan – an area normally off limits to tourists, but with the help of local friends, Wim manages to secure the permits to allow him into this troubled area.
As he follows the river searching for likely locations, he immerses himself in the tribal life along the waterways. Everyone seems to be fishing here, albeit each with their own methods. Not only the many kingfishers, pelicans and crocodiles, but also the people, young and old. What may be sport to the angler is the livelihood of many here. If you don't catch something, you and your family go hungry.
Child hunters convince him to follow them to their inland lake and show off their skill at catching a variety of fish, but the most remarkable local fishing tactics take place on dry soil. During the dry season, fish survive by burrowing themselves in the mud and staying dormant until the rains form new rivers. The locations of these buried fish or "mudfish" can be given away by subtle movements of the ground. A man whose feet can detect that faint movement above ground can spear the fish through the soil, dig it out and slowly hook it free from the earth.
As he continues his way upstream, enormous bush fires stand in his way, the temperature rises to unbearable heights and the water level drops. The turning point in his expedition comes when he gets help from a former rebel who has fought in the area and knows the river like the back of his hand. With the help of his new friend he moves further afield, onwards to deeper water, indicated by the presence of large crocodiles.
Here lies the promise of the giant. After landing a few huge tigerfish, Wim eventually hooks into a goliath that turns out to be no less than 113 kg, one of the largest Nile perches ever caught on a rod and fishing line.

programme.title: The Leopard's New Spots
programme.desc: (South Africa, 2016) The Leopard's New Spots is a documentary film about one man's mission to halt the alarming decline in southern Africa's leopard populations due to a widespread skin trade. Traditionally, only the Zulu royals have been allowed to wear leopard skins. However, in the last three decades the Shembe Church, a four million strong religious group, has adopted the skins into their ceremonial costume. The demand for leopard skins is now astronomical. Because the use of skins is so wide spread and culturally entrenched, law enforcement seems helpless to police this trade in a protected species. It has become, in one researchers words, 'a major conservation blind spot'. Leopard researcher Tristan Dickerson believes that you can't save the leopard without the support of the Shembe people. The film follows Dickerson as he travels from the heart of leopard country to the heart of Shembe and Zulu culture in an effort to discover a solution that benefits all parties. His best solution turns out to be fake fur. Bad fakes are commonly used by church members while they save for the expensive real thing. Dickerson believes that if he can produce a high quality, affordable fake fur, and gain the endorsement of the powerful leader of the Church he can turn the tables in favour of the leopard.

programme.title: Historic Football Match In Florence
programme.desc: (Germany, France, 2011) Florence, the cradle of the Renaissance, is today a so-called "museum-city". The small city center is invaded by thousands of tourists every day. But there is one sport tourists usually don't know : the calcio florentino, a violent game with no rules, exclusively for Florentine people. Struggling with the consequences of gentrification, the city is losing its identity and its citizens. But there is still one way in which Florence and the "Fiorentini" can express their own identity - the "Calcio Storico Fiorentino" (Historical Florentine soccer), a game that has been played in Florence for 800 years but only 3 days a year in the month of June! This primitive, tough and dangerous mix of football and boxing is played in one of the world's most famous squares, the Piazza Santa Croce. The players can hit the ball with their hands or feet, and they can stop their adversaries in any way possible. These two rules make the game one of the roughest sports ever played.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: (A City Transformed, United States of America, 2015) From the skyscrapers of Shanghai to the mountainous peaks of "The Last Shangri-La", explore the breathtaking landscape of this incredible country and connect with the people that infuse China's everyday life with flavor, passion and prosperity. Through the eyes of a cultural academic, a laborer, an architect, an urban planner, and a photographer, the grand evolution of a little fishing village is illustrated and documented to reveal one of the fastest growing megacities in the world. And while the physical landscape gracefully moves towards the future, beliefs, behaviors, and practices are put into test. The changes brought by the Thirty Year Miracle are indeed immense, and it has left no stone, no life, unturned.

programme.title: Freedom, the Legend Of the Eagles
programme.desc: (France, 2018) This film is a visual thrill, a dream come true of men flying alongside the last Wild Eagle living in the Alps. It is the story of an unlikely encounter between Roï the last Sea Eagle in the wild in the French Alps and Kaaba a bird of the same species, but one that has been captive for years. With the help of one man who is going to change her destiny we witness Kaaba as she undergoes an astonishing learning process on the way to Freedom

programme.title: French Foreign Legion Hell In the Rain
programme.desc: (Germany, 2010) 360° Geo - Report accompanies 2 young legionnaires during their training as jungle fighters. It is humid in the rainforest around Regina, the outpost of the French military in the South American jungle. It's not for nothing that the country is called "Guayana", "Land of water". The foreign legionnaires, who have gathered here for training to become jungle combatants, experience the meaning of this name daily. The squad is international, the training hard: transport of the wounded through the rain forest, guerilla attacks, river crossings, survival training, the self-supply of food, and time and time again, drill! The men of the 3rd infantry regiment quite often operate for days in the jungle, tracking down illegal immigrants or gold seekers.

programme.title: Gannets - The Wrong Side of the Run
programme.desc: (South Africa, 2010) At the tip of Africa two oceans collide, creating one of the most productive eco-systems on the planet. Here, one of the largest shoals of fish known to man form the basis of two food chains that split and extend for 100's of miles. After the sardines part at Cape Agulhas, each shoal passes it's own critical point. On the west coast of Africa, this is Malgas Island, a traditionally energetic hub of life dominated by the presence of the supreme sardine hunter, the Cape gannet. On the opposing coast, the shoals pass Bird Island, the eastern equivalent of Malgas. Circumstances on the two bird colonies are very different; on the west we see dwindling numbers of sardine, whilst on the east, Bird Island is the inverse. While the Malgas Gannets battle to raise chicks amid skirmishes by Kelp gulls and hungry seals, the Bird island gannets move to intercept huge volumes of sardines. What transpires is one of the greatest marine feeding events on the planet, and in these two parallel scenarios, we see how one environment is mutating under pressure, while the other experiences a bumper season. Will the gannets of Malgas island adapt to their changing world? Can the disappearing sardine stock survive, and in turn support the wide array of marine predators that rely heavily on it. The breath-taking landscape, action and predation sequences are strengthened by solid natural history behaviour with an environmental comment.

programme.title: New York - The World's Smallest Opera House
programme.desc: (Germany, France, 2008) "If you can make it there, you can make it anywhere". That's the vision people from all over the world have of New York. This report takes a look behind the scenes of the world's smallest opera house, in the heart of New York. Tony Amato, the son of an Italian butcher, thought when he came to New York in the 40s that he could make it too by realizing his dream of owning an opera house. The house is 3 stories high and three windows wide. The hall feels no bigger than a living room, however its 107 seats are always sold out. Tony Amato continues to be the center and linchpin of this miniature opera. Tony is barely 5 foot tall, with his sneakers and the small, wiry man seems to be held up by his pant-suspenders. His voice is persuasive, his eyes bright. He conducts, sings, jumps, laughs and grumbles all at once. At 88 years of age, Maestro Tony Amato is in the middle of the season's last production.

programme.title: Man Eaters
programme.desc: (Sri Lanka, 2020) The first documentary about the Human-leopard conflict in Sri Lanka, "Man Eaters: A Human Leopard Story" approaches the conflict by analyzing past and present cases of man-eating leopards in Sri Lanka and what led to their strange behavior. Unlike India, man-eating leopards in Sri Lanka are very rare.

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: (Color, Australia, 2020) Seg 1 Chromatic Adaptation. Chromatic adaptation is the ability of humans to adjust to changes in brightness to keep up with the appearance of colors. this is the reason why we are able to perceive colors properly even though lighting in real environments change constantly. Seg 2 Color-changing animals. Color changing in animals are developed adaptations which the animals use for various applications such as signaling their species or as a way to hide from predators. Animals that can change color have specialized cells called chromatophores that can alter pigmentation and light reflecting properties. Seg 3 How do we see the color pink. We are able to see pink because our brains are able to perceive variations in light and color. Although pink as a wavelength does not exist in the light spectrum, it is our brains that processes light in a such a way that we are able to perceive combinations of colors thus giving us a way to see colors like pink. Seg 4 Blue wings, blue feathers. Blue rarely exists in nature. But due to evolution, structural features in the wings and feathers of some animals allow light to bend in ways that make it possible to reflect the color blue. Seg 5 Snow camouflage. Snow camouflage, is a type of camouflage that certain creatures use to hide during winter. It is typically characterised by differing shades of grays and whites.

programme.title: The Solomon Treasures
programme.desc: (England, 2008) The discovery in Jerusalem in 2007 of a tomb said to belong to the family of Jesus of Nazareth is just the latest in a long line of extraordinary finds which have recently come to light in the Holy Land. But not all these finds are quite what they seem. Both a stone tablet said to come from the Temple of Solomon, and an ossuary apparently belonging to the brother of Jesus, have been declared fakes. The official investigation then uncovered dozens of other fakes, and attention eventually focussed on one of the most revered objects in Israel: the ivory pomegranate. This artefact has been in the Israel Museum for nearly twenty years. Like the stone tablet, it too was linked to the Temple of Solomon – and astonishingly it too, investigators concluded, was fake. As forensic scientists now turn their attention to the ossuaries from the 'Jesus family tomb', Israeli archaeologists are left fearing that history and science is being repeatedly distorted, and they face a challenge to separate fact from fiction.

programme.title: Coral Sea Dreaming
programme.desc: (United States of America, 1999) Coral Sea Dreaming enters into the very heart of life – and death – on a coral reef. It is a story that spans 500 million years and stars some of the most exotic and wonderous marine creatures on earth. Coral is the planet's greatest natu- ral architect, and coral reefs boast the highest biodiversity of any ecosystem.

programme.title: Black Mamba: Kiss Of Death
programme.desc: (South Africa, 2013) It's "Silly Season" in Mamba Valley and like zombies from their graves, the heat draws Black Mambas from the shadows. They're on the hunt for summer lodgings but as the deadliest snake on the planet, they're not popular neighbors. Many will fall foul to a gunshot or the sharp end of a shovel. But some will be lucky enough to be "rescued" by a snake wrangling team with a passion for Mambas and a unique facility where these snakes can be housed and observed. One snake has a special mission –she's recently mated and ready to deliver a new generation of silver killers into Mamba Valley. She's the deadliest snake on the planet, but can she outwit her greatest enemy and unleash her fearsome spawn on the valley?

programme.title: The Flying Firefighters Of Valencia
programme.desc: (Germany, France, 2009) In recent years, the number of forest fires has consistently increased, especially in Catalonia. The loss of forest land is endangering the cultural and natural habitat of the Northwestern Mediterranean. This report accompanies Chimo and his colleagues through last years' fire season. The "Avialsa" Flying Firefighters squadron operates in the woodland areas around the western part of the Mediterranean Sea. Flying close above the flames ensures the greatest chance of success for the firefighters: the closer they can get their water cargo to the fire source, the quicker they can get the flames under control. Joaquim Miniana, "Chimo" for short, and the pilots of the "Avialsa" firefighting plane squadron in the Spanish province of Valencia are fighting against increasingly long, hot summers.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: (Underwater Prey's Defenses, Bohemia, United States of America, 2015) The ocean can be an unforgiving place. Animals living in the sea have to deal constantly with finding food, and protecting themselves from predators. There are many ways of hiding, defending, and feeding, and every different technique has advantages for different animals. For example, some animals use camouflage to escape detection or to sneak up on their prey, while other animals have coloration which intentionally makes them stand out. Some creatures hide from predators, while others stay in groups, out in the open, relying on safety in numbers. Some animals have dangerous spines or venom for protection, but even the most venomous creatures must sometimes be wary of predators. Different animals have taken advantage of different food sources, some feeding at the top of the food chain, and others at the bottom. Protecting themselves underwater is also a matter of invention and reinvention, and aquatic animals deploy an array of strategies just to stay alive. They have quite the toolbox to dip into – Evolutionary strategms such as colour and camouflage, toxins and teeth! Nudibrancs, clown fish, squid, octopus and orca whales are just some of the wonderful winners in the underwater race of life. Underwater footage shot in the wild, demonstrates vividly how these ocean creatures have evolved to survive by adapting to their environment.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: (The Race Underfoot, Bohemia, United States of America, 2015) In this episode we explore the Race of Life on a small scale but no less competive or cruel for all that. Insects burrow through the ground, hop and sing in the trees, and dart and dance in the air. They come in many different colors and shapes. There are many reasons why insects are so successful at surviving. Their ability to survive in all kinds of temperatures and environments. A strong, hard but flexible shell called an exoskeleton covers their soft organs and is resistant to chemicals, water and physical impact. Their wings give them the option of flying away from dangerous situations or toward food or mates. In this episode: Dragonflies hover like helicopters over ponds and lakes, then suddenly dart away, pursuing prey or other dragonflies. The monarch butterfly goes through a miraculous metamorphosis, changing from an egg to a hungry caterpillar to a quiet pupa and emerging as a beautiful winged adult. The praying mantis is master of disguise. Its green body, wings and legs merge into the green, leafy background so carefully it seems to be part of the grass. Perched at an angle, with its spiny forelegs raised in a prayerlike pose, the mantis sits in still rigidness - until another insect such as a fly comes too near and is suddenly captured and devoured. Ants, like bees, hornets and wasps, are social insects and live together in colonies in many-chambered nests. Whatever it takes, to stay in the race.

programme.title: The Rescue Dogs Of Lake Garda
programme.desc: (Germany, 2011) 17 year old Ester and her dog Mia have big plans: saving lives at Lake Garda. In the north of Italy swimming rescue dogs are on duty at several lakes and the Mediterranean Sea. After traffic accidents, drowning is worldwide the second most common cause of death by accident. But a rescue is always difficult as the rescuer itself can be in danger. Like Mia, the Italian rescue dogs are mostly Newfoundland's- dogs who love the water and with a weight of at least 66 pounds (30 Kilo?), are able to pull people out of the water. For 3 years the dog- owners and their animals are trained to save lives. But the biggest challenge for Ester waits at the end: a jump out of a helicopter.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: (Drakelow Tunnels, England, 2021) The Drakelow Tunnels are a former underground military complexused mainly for storage. However, during the construction and running of this facility, 6 people are thought to have died. It is believed most of the hauntings that occur here are from the very people that died here.

programme.title: Cambodia's Last Bamboo Train
programme.desc: (France, 2008) This report climbs aboard the bamboo train, learns about its passengers and portrays life as it currently is in Cambodia. Without this bamboo train, people would not be able to go do their daily tasks such as going to work or to the doctor.Deep in the Cambodian Battambang region, a small bamboo train called "Norry" makes its way through rice fields and jungle passages. It is considered to be one of the most important lifelines into the poor region. But it looks like Norry's time is running out, because of the changes in Cambodia over the last years.More and more fields are being cleaned of land mines, new roads are being built, and many Cambodians are now able to afford a motorbike. The people fear that in a few years' time the bamboo train will stop operating.

programme.title: Tajne Pariza
programme.desc: (Francuska, 2018) Do sada su stotine stručnjaka cijeli život pokušavale dešifrirati povijest Pariza. Mnoge priče i glasine ostale su nedokazane. Pariz stoljećima čuva svoje tajne. Neke pobuđuju fascinaciju, a druge pobuđuju maštu. Činjenice, sličnosti i pouzdani svjedoci, dokazuju pojavu ovih događaja. U ovom serijalu znanstvena i povijesna istraživanja otkrit će najmračnije tajne Grada svjetla. Ovdje je grad Pariz kakav još niste vidjeli.

programme.title: Divlja godina
programme.desc: (Engleska) Ovaj dokumentarni serijal od tri nastavka donosi nam jedinstveni pogled na najznačajnije predjele britanskih sela: obalu Pembrokeshire, The North York Moors i The Fenlands, svaki obilježen vlastitim karakterom i prepun tajni koje su poznate samo onima koji tamo žive. Serijal "Divlja godina" zaranja duboko ispod površine ovih triju senzacionalnih lokacija smještenih u Britaniji te istražuje povezanost okoliša, divljeg raslinja i njihovih stanovnika. Doznat ćemo kako je tijekom tisuća godina krajolik evoluirao. Koristeći spektakularnu tehniku prolaska vremena, serijal "Divlja godina" donosi nam potpuno svjež uvid u nemirni ritam britanskog seoskog života i njegovog okoliša, nudeći nam pogled kako i zašto su se ova nevjerojatna i povijesna mjesta razvila upravo na ovakav način.

programme.title: Posljednji divovi
programme.desc: (Kanada, 2021) "Posljednji divovi" dokumentarni je serijal koji nas vodi u adrenalinske misije pune akcije u potrazi za hladnim planinskim titanima "Velikog sjevera" i golijatima iz džungle Amazone. Svrha je spasiti vrste kojima prijeti izumiranje, ali Cyril Chauquet i njegov tim također moraju preživjeti ekstremne opasnosti dok traže legendarne divove koji postoje desecima milijuna godina, ali koje su lov i okolišni čimbenici doveli u opasnost. Traže ogromnu, oklopljenu bijelu jesetru, prapovijesnog Pirarucua i jednog od najugroženijih slatkovodnih golijata na planetu: ogromnu Piraibu. To je ekstremna avantura ali očuvanje i ekstremni ribolov njihova su strast što je od vitalnog značaja ako žele spasiti neke ugrožene vrste.

programme.title: Prokletstvo Von Dutcha
programme.desc: (SAD, 2021) Kako je buntovna, kultna modna marka koju su osnovali anti-junaci kasnih 90-ih, katapultirana do globalne slave i prigrljena od strane zvijezda kao što su Pamela Anderson i Tommy Lee, Jay Z, Justin Timberlake i Britney Spears, Paris Hilton i mnogi drugi? U rasponu od gotovo tri desetljeća, ovo je priča o ljudima koji stoje iza zloglasne modne marke Von Dutch, zabadanju nožea u leđa, pohlepi i krvoproliću koji su doveli do njegovog pada. Priča počinje u osamdesetima s kulturom surfanja na Venice Beachu, preko centra Los Angelesa 90-ih pa do eksplozije moderne kulture slavnih osoba ranih 2000-ih. Uz ekskluzivni pristup hrabrim i često bizarnim likovima uključenim u sagu, "Prokletstvo Von Dutcha" upoznaje nas s surferom i narko gangsterom koji je osnovao etiketu, te otkriva kako su je prihvatili hollywoodski igrači.

programme.title: Peter Handke
programme.desc: (Njemačka, 2016) Ovo je film o riječima, o vodećoj osobi moderne književnosti, ovo je film o Peteru Handkeu, sa Peterom Handkeom. U svom novom dokumentarcu redateljica Corinna Belz istražuje enigmu zvanu Peter Handke. Njegove knjige čitaju generacije čitatelja - "Strah golmana pred jedanaestercem", "Kratko pismo za dugo rastajanje", "Trenutak pravog osjećaja", samo su neki od naslova. U šezdesetim godinama pokazao je kako pisac može postati pop zvijezda. No, u trenutku kada su njkegove knjige postale bestselleri, on je okrenuo leđa svima. Odlučio je putovati, poveo je sa sobom svoje čitatelje i uveo ih u ritam i preciznost svog jezika. Film prikazuje Petera Handekea kao mladog muškarca ali i kao osobu koja danas neprestano postavlja pitanje "Gdje smo sada?":

programme.title: Pljačka Banksyja
programme.desc: (SAD, 2016) Ožujak 2004. godine. Umjetnik poznat kao Banksy ilegalno je podigao sklupturu visoku 3 metra na malom trgu kraj avenije Shaftsbury u Londonu. Nazvana "Pijanac", ona je Banksyjev odgovor na Rodinovog "Mislioca", čuvenu skulpturu čovjeka zadubljenog u misli, brade oslonjene na ruku. Banksyjeva skulptura ima slično držanje, ali njegov čovjek izgleda kao netko tko se poslije veće količine alkohola srušio na stolicu, a na glavi mu stoji prometni čunj. Ubrzo, skulpturu je s postolja "oteo" AK47, umjetnik koji predvodi "podzemnu globalnu mrežu aktivista" pod nazivom "Art Kaida" čiji je cilj "uzdrmati suvremenu umjetnost"... Nakon nekoliko godina i medijskog rata između Banksyja i "Art Kaide", navodi se da je Banksy "sredio" da se skulptura uništi na bilo koji način. Međutim, nakon dosta vremena čini se da će AK47 udahnuti novi život u ovu sagu.

programme.desc: (Engleska) Ovaj dokumentarni serijal od tri nastavka donosi nam jedinstveni pogled na najznačajnije predjele britanskih sela: obalu Pembrokeshire, The North York Moors i The Fenlands, svaki obilježen vlastitim karakterom i prepun tajni koje su poznate samo onima koji tamo žive. programme.title: Veleno: Grad nestale djece
programme.desc: (Italija, 2021) Krajem 1990-ih u ruralnoj Italiji otkrivena je sotonistička mreža pedofila.

programme.title: Proročanstvo o papama
programme.desc: (Francuska, 2018) Irski nadbiskup iz 12. stoljeća Sveti Malahija napisao je tekst pod nazivom "Proročanstvo o papama" u kojem je predvidio kraj papinstva, uništenje Rima i sudnji dan. Je li to samo još jedna apokaliptična vizija? Još jedna priča o "kraju svijeta"? Vjerojatno nije. Tijekom gotovo 900 godina "Proročanstvo o papama" pokazalo se točnim. Čini se da je tim tekstom predviđena budućnost. U ovom dokumentarnom filmu provedena je istraga u Rimu, razgovarano je s brojnim stručnjacima, dok se u Vatikanu provjeravala točnost "Proročanstva o papama" nasuprot činjenica i događaja. Čini se da puno toga potvrđuje predviđanja Svetog Malahija.

programme.title: Najpoznatije europske željezničke stanice
programme.desc: (Francuska, 2018) Ponovno posjetite pet najznačajnijih željezničkih postaja izgrađenih u 19. stoljeću u Europi koje su i danas značajne. Sve su to katedrale industrijskog doba s licem okrenute budućnosti. Pričaju nevjerojatne priče o arhitektonskim i mehaničkim podvizima, kada je tadašnji jet set putovao Europom uz pomoć parnih mašina. Zahvaljujući spektakularnim 4k snimkama, ova serija otkriva veličanstvenost ovih javnih zgrada i brojne tajne koje one kriju.

programme.title: Bijeg na selo
programme.desc: (Engleska) Dokumentarni serijal "Bijeg na selo" donosi nam priču o savršenim domovima za obitelji koje silno žele pobjeći iz užurbanog, pomalo i divljeg života u gradu. Svaka epizoda serijala bavi se jednim parom ili cijelom obitelji koji pokušavaju pobjeći iz grada i u potpunosti svoje živote preseliti na selo. Pridružite se prezenterima u njihovoj potrazi za domom koji zadovoljava sve uvjete, dok istovremeno istražuju prekrasan i jedinstven okoliš svake lokacije koju posjećuju. Ovaj dokumentarni serijal poziva gledatelja da sazna što sve selo ima za ponuditi te ga vodi u skrivene prirodne rezervoare, zanosne povijesne građevine i upoznaje ga s lokalnim životinjskim svijetom.

programme.title: Sanjaj budućnost
programme.desc: (Medicina budućnosti, Francuska, 2016) Kako će budućnost izgledati? Kako će sadašnja otkrića i istraživanja utjecati na naše svakodnevne živote 2050. godine? Slavni znanstvenici, svjetski poznate osobe i ljudi puni strasti iz cijelog svijeta podijeliti će svoja istraživanja i svoje poglede na budući život u 20 nevjerojatnih epizoda od koji je svaka fokusirana na jednu temu: Medicina, Kuće, Hrana, Moda, Prijevoz,

programme.title: Iznimni inženjerski pothvati
programme.desc: (Njemačka) Ova serija ukazuje na primamljivo zavodljiv proces gradnje i montaže globalnih superlativa, gdje se inovacije stapaju s nevjerojatnim mašinama. Od najvećih svjetskih brodova do hiper modernih zrakoplova. Od jedne od najvećih tvornica kamiona do oklopnih čeličnih vozila. Testosteronski dokumentarni serijal u najboljem izdanju.

programme.title: Pod suncem
programme.desc: (Letonija, Sjeverna Koreja, Češka, Rusija, Njemačka, 2015) Film razotkriva propagandne modele stvaranja sjevernokorejskog nacionalnog filmskog narativa. Poznatog ruskog redatelja, Vitalija Manskog, vlasti Demokratske Narodne Republike Koreje pozvale su da snimi film o djevojčici Zinmi i njenoj obitelji kako bi svijetu prikazao idealan život u toj zemlji. Na vlastitom setu redatelj je uključio svoju kameru i tajno snimao 'ono što nije trebao', od namještanja filmskog seta, do neprestanih promjena dijaloga, svaki put kada se partijskim komesarima neka replika učinila nedovoljno komunističkom. Na satu povijesti, na filmskom setu, u svakodnevnom životu, sve je zadano, kao i scenarij još jednog propagandnog filma, čiji se nastanak po prvi put vidi iznutra. Prvorazredni kreativni dokumentarac jednog od trenutno najboljih europskih redatelja.

programme.title: Brodovi i ljudi
programme.desc: (Kanada, Francuska) Za ljude koji žive u blizini plovnih putova ili na priobalnim područjima širom svijeta, brodovi su bitan element njihova svakodnevnog života. Ova serija vodi nas na putovanje u otkrivanju brodova svih oblika i veličina, koji služe u različite svrhe. Od improviziranog čamca do većih brodova za kolektivni prijevoz, od plutajućih restorana ili škola do tradicionalnih ribarskih čamaca, svaka epizoda isprepliće dva odredišta i kombinira različite vrste brodova.

programme.title: Najčudnija mjesta istočne Europe
programme.desc: (Kanada) Želite li svom sljedećem putovanju dodati neke uzbudljive atrakcije? Formula serije je jednostavna; za svaki istočnoeuropski grad koji posjeti, šarmantna i dinamična voditeljica sastavlja popis 10 najčudnijih mjesta za vidjeti i stvari koje treba učiniti. Gradovi se istražuju jedan po jedan. Intrigantna mjesta, bizarne turističke atrakcije, ostaci prošlosti i živopisni ljudi s neobičnim talentima su u trgovini, spremni vas šokirati!

programme.title: Najpoznatije europske željezničke stanice
programme.desc: (Francuska, 2018) Ponovno posjetite pet najznačajnijih željezničkih postaja izgrađenih u 19. stoljeću u Europi koje su i danas značajne. programme.title: Ukradena remek djela
programme.desc: (Francuska, 2017) Ovo je najveći muzej na svijetu… muzej umjetnina ukradenih tijekom stoljeća i nikad ponovno otkrivenih. Ova djela progone noćne more svojih vlasnika i okupiraju dane stotinama policajaca diljem svijeta, kao i nekolicini privatnih agencija; nijedna zemlja ili muzej od značaja ne može tvrditi da je pošteđen. Prema Interpolu, krađa umjetnina je četvrta najveća kriminalna trgovina, nakon trgovine drogom, trgovine oružjem i pranja novca. Kako bi moglo biti drugačije, kada skokovita cijena umjetnina tjera vrijednost nekih slika u desetke milijuna eura? Čini se da je ovaj svijet pun misterija. Sindikati kriminala surađuju sa sitnim kriminalcima, a policiji je više stalo do povrata predmeta nego do uhićenja počinitelja.

programme.title: Prve dame Amerike
programme.desc: (Nancy Reagan, SAD, 2020) Kažu da iza svakog velikog muškarca stoji velika žena. "Prve dame Amerike", koje donose nagrađivani redatelji Kim Duke, Liz Mermin i Kat English, fascinantna je dokumentarna serija u šest dijelova a svaka epizoda istražuje život jedne od šest kultnih žena čija imena pričaju priču o novijoj povijesti SAD-a: Eleanor Roosevelt, Lady Bird Johnson, Jackie Kennedy, Nancy Reagan, Hillary Rodham Clinton i Michelle Obama. Serija istražuje kako se svaka od tih žena našla u samom srcu američke moći i kako je svaka od njih ostavila svoj trag u američkom političkom životu i društvu. Spajajući dubinske intervjue, rijetke arhivske snimke i uvjerljive rekreacije, prve dame otkrivaju ključne, često skrivene trenutke, koji su oblikovali putovanje tih žena. Svaka od tih žena pomogla je stvoriti naslijeđe svog supruga, dok su također slijedili vlastite ciljeve i oblikovale svoje jedinstvene uloge. "Prve dame Amerike" konačno stavljaju ove moćne dame na prvo mjesto.

programme.title: Sanjaj budućnost
programme.desc: (Medicina budućnosti, Francuska, 2016) Kako će budućnost izgledati? Kako će sadašnja otkrića i istraživanja utjecati na naše svakodnevne živote 2050. godine? Gradovi se istražuju jedan po jedan. Intrigantna mjesta, bizarne turističke atrakcije, ostaci prošlosti i živopisni ljudi s neobičnim talentima su u trgovini, spremni vas šokirati!

programme.title: Američka pita: Vjenčanje
programme.desc: (Njemačka, SAD, 2003) Jim Levenstein (Jason Biggs) konačno je uspio skupiti hrabrost i zaprositi svoju djevojku Michelle Flaherty (Alyson Hannigan), koja je oduševljeno pristala. Međutim, pravi problemi za Jima tek započinju jer mora početi planirati ceremoniju vjenčanja. Svadbi se, jednako koliko i roditelji budućih mladenaca, vesele i Jimovi prijatelji Kevin (Thomas Ian Nicholas) i Finch (Eddie Kaye Thomas), koji vijest ne uspijevaju sakriti od Stiflera (Seann William Scott). On je u gradu i neće dozvoliti da ovako svečani čin protekne bez nužne prethodnice, momačke večeri! Jim ne zna što mu se sprema, više se brine oko toga hoće li ga Michelleini roditelji prihvatiti i hoće li naučiti plesati do vjenčanja.

programme.title: To je Voyo
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Voyo svojim korisnicima pruža jedinstveno iskustvo streamanja - raznovrstan i recentan sadržaj, gledanje bez reklama, fantastičnu opciju da pogledaju svoj omiljeni show 24 sata prije prikazivanja na televiziji te brojne druge mogućnosti! Na novoj RTL-ovoj streaming platformi Voyo korisnici mogu gledati sve RTL-ove kanale uživo, a očekuje ih čak 1500 različitih naslova – širok izbor novih filmova svih žanrova, kao i poznati filmski klasici, strane serije te regionalni hitovi, vrhunski dokumentarci, sportski i glazbeni megaspektakli, najveći reality showovi i bogat dječji sadržaj.

programme.title: Bijeg iz Gulaga
programme.desc: (Indija, Ujedinjeni Arapski Emirati, SAD, Poljska, 2010) Tijekom Drugog svjetskog rata, nakon sovjetske invazije na Poljsku, mladi poljski vojni časnik Janusz Wieszczek (Jim Sturgess) nalazi se u zatočeništvu kao ratni zarobljenik. Ministarstvo unutarnjih poslova Sovjetskog Saveza, tzv. NKVD, ispituje ga i pokušava prisilom iznuditi priznanje da je špijun, no njihovi pokušaji su bezuspješni. Kako njihovo "uvjeravanje" ne donese rezultate, oni odvode njegovu suprugu u pritvor te iz nje iznude izjavu. Wieszczek je osuđen na prisilni rad u trajanju od 20 godina u radnom logoru duboko u Sibiru, gdje upoznaje američkog inženjera G. Smitha (Ed Harris), glumca Khabarova (Mark Strong), okorjelog ruskog kriminalca Valku (Colin Farrell), umjetnika iz Poljske Tomasza (Alexandru Potocean), svećenika iz Latvije Voss (Gustaf Skarsgård), Poljaka Kazika, koji pati od noćne sljepoće (Sebastian Urzendowsky), te računovođu iz Jugoslavije Zorana (Dragoş Bucur). Zajedno s njima, Wieszczek planira bijeg iz gulaga.

programme.title: Kockić i prijatelji
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Znatiželjni i razigrani Kockić središnji je lik novog animiranog serijala. Svaki dan kreće u nove šarolike avanture koje zabavljaju, poučavaju i intrigiraju. Maleni će se gledatelji na taj način vrlo lako moći poistovjetiti s njim, slijediti ga u brojnim pustolovinama i pomagati mu savladati sve probleme s kojima se susreće. Teme obrađene u serijalu uistinu su šarolike te vrlo aktualne i prilagođene najmlađima – od prihvaćanja različitosti, pomaganja drugima, ljubavi prema životinjama, učenja, promicanja pozitivnih životnih vrijednosti i zagovaranja pravog prijateljstva, pa sve do praktičnih savjeta, poput savjesnog korištenja moderne tehnologije, prometnih pravila, važnosti pravilnog odlaganja i recikliranja otpada.

programme.title: Blago nama
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2020) Da bi se poštedio blama u Bruxellesu i podignuo pedigre na višu razinu, Boris završava na tečaju za sommeliera, no trzavica između Drage i Ivana oko domaćeg vina će narušiti Ivanovo povjerenje u vlastiti vinograd. programme.title: San snova

Mirko i Dado pokreću zajednički posao, dok Dado ima svoje planove. Sonja i Dizel se neočekivano zbližavaju, za razliku od Matea i Karla.

programme.title: Večera za 5
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2024) Umirovljenik Stjepan Sertić ugostio je protukandidate posljednjeg dana ovotjedne 'Večere za 5'. Pripravu večere započeo je desertom 'Voćna fantazija'. Stjepan je za desert ekipi odlučio ponuditi voćnu fantaziju - urbani kolač. Za predjelo, domaćin je odlučio spraviti 'Lađanski zalogaj'. Odlučio se Stjepan ponuditi roladu i suhomesnati proizvod - kulen. Za kraj, Stjepan je odlučio spraviti 'Vinkovačko blago'. Glavno jelo bila je svinjska vratina s povrćem. Nakon što je spravio večeru, Stjepan se okrenuo pripremi za dolazak gostiju.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen Hrvatska
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2024) Pobjednički duh, emocije i vrhunska jela - natjecatelji 'Hell's Kitchena' pokazat će kako izgleda dan u pravom restoranu! Na RTL-u kreće 'Hell's Kitchen Hrvatska', novi uzbudljivi show u kojem se natjecatelji s iskustvom rada u kuhinji natječu jedni protiv drugih. Pred njima su različiti kulinarski izazovi i zadaci, među kojima je i posluživanje večere u sljedovima za goste.Čak 18 kandidata spremno je pokazati svoje vještine u kuhinji. Pobjednik koji osvaja sjajnu nagradu od 30.000 eura može biti samo jedan, no kako će izgledati put kandidata u jednoj od najpopularnijih emisija na svijetu? Pustolovina zvana 'Hell's Kitchen Hrvatska' započet će šarolikom skupinom od čak 18 kandidata koji žele dokazati da su baš oni spremni za svaki izazov glavnog chefa Toma Gretića i pobjedu.

programme.title: Večera za 5
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2024) "Večera za 5" je zabavna lifestyle emisija natjecateljskog karaktera. Svaki tjedan pet kandidata imat će priliku predstaviti se gledateljima kroz svoje kulinarsko umijeće kao i kroz svoj osobni smisao za estetiku i male trikove aranžiranja stola i samih jela. Osim tradicionalnih hrvatskih specijaliteta, natjecatelji će eksperimentirati i s modernim delicijama od kojih rastu zazubice. Prednost za svakog kandidata je što kuhaju u udobnosti vlastitog doma po svojim receptima, sastavljajući menije i radeći ugođaj po svom izboru. Ono što će im otežati posao je jedno od pravila igre po kojemu kandidati kuhaju za četvero svojih protukandidata koji moraju biti pravedni u ocjenjivanju, ali u isto vrijeme moraju paziti da im pobjeda ne izmakne iz ruku.

programme.title: San snova
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Kristina okrene situaciju u svoju korist, a Bubalo i Zvonimir primaju samo loše vijesti. Mirko dobiva novog cimera Dadu, koji mu se bezuspješno pokušava svidjeti. Mateo i Karlo još uvijek su u svađi. Zbog rata između Bubala i Sonje, Maja je na rubu živaca. Nives kvari Mirku planove za pokretanje nogometne akademije, ali on ne odustaje. Nakon svađe Nives i Telca, Dujmović se pokušava okoristiti situacijom te pokazuje svoje pravo lice. Zvonimir bezuspješno pokušava držati Bubala dalje od novinara i novih skandala, dok ovaj odluči sazvati konferenciju za novinare.

programme.title: Brak na prvu (nova sezona)
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Dvoje potpunih stranaca upoznaje se pred "oltarom" i vjenča, a tek onda počinje njihova ljubavna avantura života zvana "Brak na prvu".

programme.title: RTL Direkt
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2024) RTL Direkt je dnevni late night news magazin u kojem će gledatelj dobiti pregled najvažnijih događaja dana, kao i najnovije vijesti večeri, a one priče koje su od posebnog interesa i važnosti će obraditi ne samo u formi reportaže već i kroz studijske intervjue s relevantnim i stručnim gostima.

programme.title: Glavni heroj
programme.desc: (SAD, 2021) "Free City" je online videoigrica u kojoj sudjeluje mnogo igrača, a osmislio ju je Soonami Studios. Online igrači razlikuju se od likova u igrici, tj. stanovnika grada po tome što u igrici nose naočale, ali i po tome što, za razliku od "običnih" građana, stvaraju kaos i uništavaju sve što stignu. Stanovnici grada nisu svjesni da svijet u kojem žive nije stvaran dok žive svoje živote prema programu, scenariju. Jedan od tih građana je bankar Guy (Ryan Reynolds), a njegov najbolji prijatelj je zaštitar Buddy (Lil Rel Howery). U međuvremenu, u stvarnom svijetu programerka Millie Rusk (Jodie Comer) trudi se dokazati da joj je Soonami Studios ukrao autorska prava. Kada Guy ugleda Milliein avatar u igrici, zaljubljuje se u nju te počinje odstupati od shema, uobičajene rutine programa. Vjerujući da je Guy zapravo haker, Soonami ga pokušava maknuti, dok mu Millie otkriva da svijet u kojem živi nije stvaran te da će uskoro biti ugašen.

programme.title: To je Voyo

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: (Rob dužnosti, SAD, 2009) Hotch je uzeo dopust kako bi razmislio o svojoj budućnosti u FBI-u. U međuvremenu, BAU putuje u Nashville kako bi uhitio serijskog ubojicu koji uhodi žene i pokušava ih zavesti prije nego što ih ubije.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi

programme.title: Prijatelji
programme.desc: (SAD, 1996) Oni su poput druge obitelji. Radnja serije prati šest likova; Rachel, Monicu, Phoebe, Joeyja, Chandlera i Rossa, koji žele ostvariti svoje snove u velikom gradu New Yorku i spontano postanu prijatelji za cijeli život. Rachel se želi baviti modom, Monica sanja o kuharskoj karijeri, Joey daje sve od sebe da postane slavni glumac, Ross je paleontolog koji nikako da ostvari sreću u ljubavi, Phoebe je uistinu imala težak život, no to je ne sprečava da bude jedna od najpozitivnijih osoba u seriji, a Chandler radi u velikoj korporaciji i ima sarkastičan pogled na svijet. Prijatelji doživljavaju brojne komične i romantične avanture, a okosnica njihove zanimljive svakodnevice svakako su odnosi među njima.

programme.title: Samo hrabro
programme.desc: (SAD, 2020) Razvedeni terapeut Drew (Thomas Middleditch) primi lošu vijest da mu je zatajio bubreg i da će mu trebati novi. Dobra vijest je da se radi o ranoj fazi bolesti te da nije kasno potražiti novi bubreg, prvenstveno od članova obitelji koji su najizgledniji donatori. Kasnije, na jednom vjenčanju, nakon dugo vremena, Drew sretne srednjoškolsku prijateljicu Ginu (Annaleigh Ashford), koja mu istog trenutka bez razmišljanja ponudi svoj bubreg.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: (SAD, 2015) Pravila možeš kršiti, ali zakon moraš poštivati. Detektiv Hank Voight (Jason Beghe) vodi elitnu obavještajnu jedinicu u 21. policijskom okrugu. Unatoč agresivnom ponašanju, spremnosti da zaobiđe pravila, prijeđe granicu i prekrši nečija prava kako bi riješio zločin i ispravio nepravdu, zagonetni narednik Voight odan je policajcima i detektivima kojima zapovijeda te suosjeća sa žrtvama zločina koje njegova jedinica istražuje. Prije nego što je preuzeo zapovjedništvo nad obavještajnim službama, Voight je radio u jedinici Odjela za suzbijanje djelovanja bandi i njegov je otac bio policajac, ali je ubijen na dužnosti. Voight je udovac, supruga Camille umrla je od raka prije nekoliko godina, sin Justin je u vojsci, dok je Erin Lindsay (Sophia Bush), koju je upoznao kada je bila 14-godišnjakinja delikventica, odgojio kao svoju kćer. Danas je Erin detektivka u njegovom odjelu.

programme.title: Specijalizant
programme.desc: (SAD, 2021) Tri godine nakon što je preminula Nic, Conrad je napustio Chastain te pokrenuo privatnu praksu kako bi imao vremena odgajati Gigi. Conrad dovodi Jacksona s terminalnim rakom pluća u Chastain na liječenje ozlijeđenog prsta. No odjednom očajni Jackson uzima taoce u pokušaju da dođe do navodnog čudotvornog lijeka.

programme.title: CSI: Las Vegas
programme.desc: (SAD, Kanada, 2014) U gradu lažnih nada ništa nije onako kako se čini. U gradu kocke i zabave, koji živi danonoćno, kriminal nikada ne spava. Las Vegas je grad instant-uspjeha, prepun igara na sreću za one naivne i sretne, krcat posjetiteljima koji su laka meta različitih vrsta zlikovaca, uvjerenih da je Las Vegas meka kriminala i da nikada neće biti uhvaćeni.

programme.title: Zabranjena ljubav
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Blizanci Petra Novak i Danijel Lončar, razdvojeni odmah nakon rođenja, ne znaju jedno za drugo, odrastaju u različitim obiteljima, no povezuje ih snažan osjećaj da im nešto nedostaje zbog čega njihov život nije potpun. Dvadeset godina kasnije sudbonosan susret budi nagomilane osjećaje, Petra i Danijel se zaljubljuju i napokon pronalaze ono "nešto" što im je nedostajalo cijeli život. No kada se otkrije istina, njihova ljubav postaje zabranjena, uništava im snove, otkriva uznemirujuće tajne i budi dugo potiskivane strasti koje su ih razdirale.

programme.title: K.T. 2
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2007) Troje policijskih inspektora bori se protiv zločina o kakvima ste do sada čitali samo u novinama. Viši inspektor Ivan Primorac, inspektori Leon Lučić i Anja Morić iskusni su policajci koji će vas kroz napeti polusatni ritam otkrivanja zločina uvesti u tajne kriminalističke istrage; forenzike, ispitivanja svjedoka i praćenja osumnjičenika. Osnova formata je lažni dokumentarizam: mješavina fikcije i dokumentarnog prikazivanja.

programme.title: Sudnica
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) RTL na male ekrane donosi "Sudnicu" - svjetski uspješan format koji će zadovoljiti apetite širokog gledateljstva najzanimljivijim primjerima iz domaće sudske prakse! Teško je i naslutiti kakvi se sve slučajevi iz grane obiteljskog prava skrivaju na policama sudskih arhiva: najbizarniji oblici bračnih nevjera, nesmiljene borbe za skrbništvo nad djecom, borba za naslijeđe nekad idiličnih parova, samo su neke od tema koje obrađuje "Sudnica". Uloge boraca za svoja prava dodijeljene su "običnim" ljudima bez glumačkog iskustva, dok će slučajeve voditi osobe iz pravne struke, što emisiji daje dodatnu uvjerljivost. Sudnicom uvjerljivo vlada sudac Ivan Gajski - markantan muškarac velikog iskustva, strpljiv, staložen i prije svega pravedan. Spreman je donijeti odluku koja ne oduševljava njegovu okolinu, a u tome je odlučan i nepokolebljiv. Optužba i obrana u rukama su fantastičnih odvjetnika: Barbare Gabrić i Matije Jurlina. Barbara Gabrić mlada je i atraktivna odvjetnica u usponu karijere i za svoju se stranku bori s puno žara, a nerijetko preokrene tijek suđenja iznošenjem novih informacija za trajanja samog procesa. Matija Jurlin, pak, ispunjava show svojom neiscrpnom energijom. Taj odlučni odvjetnik ne preže ni pred čim kako bi dokazao i potkrijepio tvrdnje svoje stranke pa su mu verbalna prepucavanja i nadmudrivanja s odvjetnicom Gabrić poseban izazov. Od svjedoka suprotne strane ponekad u zadnji tren izvlači informacije korisne za svog klijenta.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: (SAD, 2016) Oni su bez sumnje genijalni, no zašto im je onda tako teško prići ljepšem spolu? Uz pomoć Kaley Cuoco, prijatelji će naučiti najvažniju životnu lekciju!Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna je zagonetka dvojici prijatelja. Oni su briljantni fizičari koji mogu shvatiti kako svemir funkcionira, no kako komunicirati s ljudima, osobito djevojkama, potpuni im je misterij. To se počinje mijenjati kada se Penny (Kaley Cuoco) doseli u njihovo susjedstvo. I dok je Sheldon sretan sa svojim disfunkcionalnim prijateljima Wolowitzom (Simon Helberg) i Koothrappalijem (Kunal Nayyar), Leonard u Penny vidi šansu za romansom.

programme.title: Dva i pol muškarca
programme.desc: (SAD, 2013) "Dva i pol muškarca" prikazuje život dvojice braće, sina/nećaka i mnoštva žena koje ih okružuju. Točnije, Charlie Harper dobrostojeći je neženja s kućom na obali, Mercedesom u garaži i znanjem vještog ophođenja sa ženama. Ali njegov opušteni život u Malibuu ometaju njegov ukočeni i napeti brat Alan i Alanov sin Jake, koji već godinama žive kod njega. Unatoč kompleksnosti njihovih života i njihovim međusobnim napetim odnosima, Charlie i Alan jedno imaju zajedničko: obojica vole Jakea i žele mu samo najbolje. Zato uspijevaju stvoriti malu obiteljsku zajednicu u kojoj bi svatko od njih mogao postati bolji čovjek.

Rachel se želi baviti modom, Monica sanja o kuharskoj karijeri, Joey daje sve od sebe da postane slavni glumac, Ross je paleontolog koji nikako da ostvari sreću u ljubavi, Phoebe je uistinu imala težak život, no to je ne sprečava da bude jedna od najpozitivnijih osoba u seriji, a Chandler radi u velikoj korporaciji i ima sarkastičan pogled na svijet. Prijatelji doživljavaju brojne komične i romantične avanture, a okosnica njihove zanimljive svakodnevice svakako su odnosi među njima.

programme.title: Specijalizant
programme.desc: (SAD, 2021) Kao pripravnik, Billien sin Trevor započinje svoj prvi dan kao u Chastainu. Ubrzo razbjesni Devona arogancijom i bezosjećajnim ponašanjem prema pacijentima. Conrad dolazi u bolnicu i pristaje pomoći AJ-u liječiti njegovu majku Carol i shvati da imunoterapija, koja drži Carolin tumor u mirovanju, napada njezine organe te je sada ubija.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: (SAD, 2003) Izdavač popularnog magazina o svijetu glamura nađen je mrtav u svojoj teretani pod zagonetnim okolnostima. Svi tragovi vode do zloglasnih swinging tuluma u Sapphire vili. I dok je vikend u takvoj vili san svakog muškarca, Monk ne može zamisliti gore mjesto za posjetiti.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: (G. Monk i dvanaesti čovjek, SAD, 2003) Nakon niza neobičnih napada i ubojstava policija zove Monka da pronađe poveznicu između žrtava te zaustavi ubojicu prije nego što počini novi zločin.

programme.title: Chicago u plamenu
programme.desc: (Nuklearna opcija, SAD, 2014) Casey primi iznenađujuće novosti o svojoj sestri - njezin suprug Jordan i ona se razvode. Nakon poziva, Hermann dolazi do Bodena i ispituje kandidatkinju Dawson. Severide nastavlja piti kako bi ublažio svoju tugu.

programme.title: Chicago u plamenu
programme.desc: (Luđaci i budale, SAD, 2014) Tim stiže u pomoć dječaku čija je glava zapela u balkonsku ogradu koja se nagnula. Dawson traži od Hermanna da je više trenira te da ima više povjerenja u nju. Casey poduzima sve kako bi osigurao da njegova sestra ne ostane bez svega u brakorazvodnoj parnici. Mills prati Newhousea koji želi vratiti ukradenog psa. Severide i tim pripremaju se za put u Vegas, a Severide ondje upozna tajanstvenu ženu.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: (Ulica Mosely, SAD, 2010) Osmogodišnja djevojčica nestane u Virginiji, a majka tvrdi da je kćerina otmica povezana s otmicom sina Charlieja. BAU tim je u potrazi za otmičarom odgovornim za nestanak dvanaestero djece u 10 godina.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: (SAD, 2010) Baza podataka otkriva da je pet žena ubijenih na autocestama likvidirao serijski ubojica. Tim je u potrazi za kamiondžijom iz Edgewooda u Novom Meksiku, koji ima osobne skrivene motive.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: (SAD, 2016) Oni su bez sumnje genijalni, no zašto im je onda tako teško prići ljepšem spolu? Uz pomoć Kaley Cuoco, prijatelji će naučiti najvažniju životnu lekciju!Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna je zagonetka dvojici prijatelja. Oni su briljantni fizičari koji mogu shvatiti kako svemir funkcionira, no kako komunicirati s ljudima, osobito djevojkama, potpuni im je misterij. To se počinje mijenjati kada se Penny (Kaley Cuoco) doseli u njihovo susjedstvo. I dok je Sheldon sretan sa svojim disfunkcionalnim prijateljima Wolowitzom (Simon Helberg) i Koothrappalijem (Kunal Nayyar), Leonard u Penny vidi šansu za romansom.

programme.title: Dva i pol muškarca
programme.desc: (SAD, 2013) "Dva i pol muškarca" prikazuje život dvojice braće, sina/nećaka i mnoštva žena koje ih okružuju. Točnije, Charlie Harper dobrostojeći je neženja s kućom na obali, Mercedesom u garaži i znanjem vještog ophođenja sa ženama. Ali njegov opušteni život u Malibuu ometaju njegov ukočeni i napeti brat Alan i Alanov sin Jake, koji već godinama žive kod njega. Unatoč kompleksnosti njihovih života i njihovim međusobnim napetim odnosima, Charlie i Alan jedno imaju zajedničko: obojica vole Jakea i žele mu samo najbolje. Zato uspijevaju stvoriti malu obiteljsku zajednicu u kojoj bi svatko od njih mogao postati bolji čovjek.

programme.title: Samo hrabro
programme.desc: (SAD, 2020) Razvedeni terapeut Drew (Thomas Middleditch) primi lošu vijest da mu je zatajio bubreg i da će mu trebati novi. Dobra vijest je da se radi o ranoj fazi bolesti te da nije kasno potražiti novi bubreg, prvenstveno od članova obitelji koji su najizgledniji donatori. Kasnije, na jednom vjenčanju, nakon dugo vremena, Drew sretne srednjoškolsku prijateljicu Ginu (Annaleigh Ashford), koja mu istog trenutka bez razmišljanja ponudi svoj bubreg.

programme.title: To je Voyo
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Voyo svojim korisnicima pruža jedinstveno iskustvo streamanja - raznovrstan i recentan sadržaj, gledanje bez reklama, fantastičnu opciju da pogledaju svoj omiljeni show 24 sata prije prikazivanja na televiziji te brojne druge mogućnosti! Na novoj RTL-ovoj streaming platformi Voyo korisnici mogu gledati sve RTL-ove kanale uživo, a očekuje ih čak 1500 različitih naslova – širok izbor novih filmova svih žanrova, kao i poznati filmski klasici, strane serije te regionalni hitovi, vrhunski dokumentarci, sportski i glazbeni megaspektakli, najveći reality showovi i bogat dječji sadržaj.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: (SAD, 2015) Pravila možeš kršiti, ali zakon moraš poštivati. Detektiv Hank Voight (Jason Beghe) vodi elitnu obavještajnu jedinicu u 21. policijskom okrugu. Unatoč agresivnom ponašanju, spremnosti da zaobiđe pravila, prijeđe granicu i prekrši nečija prava kako bi riješio zločin i ispravio nepravdu, zagonetni narednik Voight odan je policajcima i detektivima kojima zapovijeda te suosjeća sa žrtvama zločina koje njegova jedinica istražuje. Prije nego što je preuzeo zapovjedništvo nad obavještajnim službama, Voight je radio u jedinici Odjela za suzbijanje djelovanja bandi i njegov je otac bio policajac, ali je ubijen na dužnosti. Voight je udovac, supruga Camille umrla je od raka prije nekoliko godina, sin Justin je u vojsci, dok je Erin Lindsay (Sophia Bush), koju je upoznao kada je bila 14-godišnjakinja delikventica, odgojio kao svoju kćer. Danas je Erin detektivka u njegovom odjelu.

programme.title: CSI: Las Vegas
programme.desc: (SAD, Kanada, 2014) U gradu lažnih nada ništa nije onako kako se čini. U gradu kocke i zabave, koji živi danonoćno, kriminal nikada ne spava. Las Vegas je grad instant-uspjeha, prepun igara na sreću za one naivne i sretne, krcat posjetiteljima koji su laka meta različitih vrsta zlikovaca, uvjerenih da je Las Vegas meka kriminala i da nikada neće biti uhvaćeni.

programme.title: Vatre Ivanjske
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2014) Božo napokon prihvaća Andriju jer vidi da se uistinu promijenio. Marija krade Božin novac iz sefa i nosi ga Magdaleni, ali doživi šok kad shvati da je ona pobjegla iz bolnice.

programme.title: Zig i Sharko
programme.desc: (Francuska) Na osamljenom vulkanskom otoku, daleko u prostranstvima Tihog oceana živi lukava hijena Zig. Njegovi dani svode se na neprestane pokušaje hvatanja prelijepe sirene crvene kose - Marine, koju čuva Sharko, velika bijela psina. Osim što je njezin tjelohranitelj, on je i zaljubljen u nju, što ga još više tjera da je pod svaku cijenu obrani.

programme.title: Sportske igre mladih
programme.desc: Sportske igre mladih najveća su manifestacija za djecu i omladinu na ovim prostorima čiji je osnovni cilj promocija zdravog načina života i prijateljstva. Već dugi niz godina osnovnoškolcima i srednjoškolcima iz Hrvatske, Bosne i Hercegovine te Srbije omogućuje potpuno besplatno sudjelovanje u natjecanjima u deset sportskih disciplina (mali nogomet, odbojka na pijesku, košarka, rukomet, odbojka, igra između dve vatre, stoni tenis, tenis, atletika i šah).

programme.title: Etno sat
programme.desc: (Rudarska grebalica, Hrvatska, 2016) Serijal od 25 epizoda pod nazivom "Etno sat" bavi se tradicijskom kulturom Hrvatske. Putujući Istrom, Slavonijom, Dalmacijom, Hrvatskim zagorjem i drugim dijelovima Lijepe Naše susretali smo se s kulturnom ostavštinom pojedinih krajeva te doznali kako se ona njeguje i danas. Danas su u tradicijske običaje, plesove i sviranje starih instrumenata dosta uključena i djeca, koja njeguju ostavštinu svojih djedova i baka. Ekipa Etno sata družila se s malim zvončarima iz Viškova, vrsnim plesačicama baluna iz Pazina, prisustvovala je klapskom pjevanju mladih Splićanki i Splićana te posjetila vrtićke alkare i djevojke iz Vrlike koje njeguju ojkanje. Folklorne skupine pokazale su kako se pleše nijemo kolo, linđo, drmeš i slavonsko kolo. Zabilježili smo zvukove mandolina, tamburica, gajda, sopela te naučili izradu licitarskog srca, drvenih igračaka za djecu i šestinskih kišobrana.

programme.title: Sport za sve
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Edukativni format domaće produkcije sastoji se od 20 epizoda, a svaka je posvećena jednom sportu. Voditelji serijala su Tatjana Gržan i Davor Balažin, dobro poznati voditelji RTL Kockice, kojima je ovo prvi zajednički serijal jer su se do sada uglavnom pojavljivali zasebno. Sada su proputovali cijelu Hrvatsku kako bi svojim gledateljima predstavili što više sportova. U Zagrebu su snimali skijanje, hokej, klizanje, gimnastiku, penjanje na umjetnim stjenama, badminton. Posjetili su i Rijeku, Pulu i Split. Na morskim lokacijama snimali su vodene sportove, atletiku, koturaljkanje, skejtanje.

programme.title: Mali izviđači
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Uz pomoć malih izviđača učimo o prirodi i snalaženju u njoj, kako podići šator, vezati čvorove ili se na nepoznatome prostoru snaći uz pomoć kompasa, samo su neki od korisnih trikova koji će na zabavan i poučan način biti predstavljeni najmlađim gledateljima. Uz već dobro poznati voditeljski par Davora Balažin i Tatjanu Horvatić sve je zabavnije, pa tako u ovom formatu ne manjka smijeha i igre. Je li Tatjana naučila koristiti sunčani sat te koliko dobro Davor poznaje kompas i strane svijeta, možete provjeriti od ponedjeljka do petka u jutarnjem terminu.

programme.title: Mali izviđači
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Uz pomoć malih izviđača učimo o prirodi i snalaženju u njoj, kako podići šator, vezati čvorove ili se na nepoznatome prostoru snaći uz pomoć kompasa, samo su neki od korisnih trikova koji će na zabavan i poučan način biti predstavljeni najmlađim gledateljima.
